DataElement.preferredDefinition: An explanation that describes the type of protocol deviation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)_An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unintended departure from the study plan which has not been prospectively reviewed and approved by the IRB and FDA.

Concepts.definition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)

Property.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)_Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added concept to value meaning. mc 3/20/12

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.: A discrepancy between a computed, observed, or measured value or condition and the true, specified, or theoretically correct value or condition.

Concepts.definition: The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.
A discrepancy between a computed, observed, or measured value or condition and the true, specified, or theoretically correct value or condition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.: A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

Concepts.definition: A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.
A position, opinion, or judgment reached on an issue under consideration.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.: A discrepancy between a computed, observed, or measured value or condition and the true, specified, or theoretically correct value or condition.

Concepts.definition: A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.
A discrepancy between a computed, observed, or measured value or condition and the true, specified, or theoretically correct value or condition.
